content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet these tiny crocheted pumpkins are so much fun to make and even more fun to finish by stuffing them with scented poyfil i will show you how on a youtube video after you follow the written crochet pattern 1 easy to read crochet pattern 2 easy to find yarn 3 video that shows you how to add the scented poyfil to your tiny pumpkin video link 1 4 great for gift giving 5 wonderful to use in your farmhouse or country home 6 use them as an air freshner in your car 7 use the scented pumpkins as a sachet for your drawers or closet this project has been the most fun i hope you will enjoy using this crochet pattern and i hope it brings joy to your life god bless krissy copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2021 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=yxhe4rdmbw4
